title: ↪ 📱 Cl Exclusive  Furnished 2/2.5 Direct Ocean View, Large 2 SUNNY ISLES:
posting_body: ['REF# 11R114', '$6800 · Furnished · La Perla Condo · Sunny Isles · 1602 Sqft · 2/2.5', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Direct ocean view, large 2 bedrooms/ 2.5 bath.', 'Fully furnished & equipped, tastefully decorated, upgraded kitchen, fresh painted, huge rap-around terrace from 32nd floor!', 'with always preferable east view (ocean, city, intracoastal).', 'Luxury amenities, including pool, gym, jacuzzi, beach service and valet parking.', '24 h concierge.', 'Convenient location close to shopping entertainment and public transportation.', 'Priced for 6 or more months rent.', 'Available for long term only.', 'Priced for one year lease.', 'Price for 6 months will be discussed.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 11R114', 'tags:', '2 midtown, the loft 2 downtown, fifty seven residences, le parc at brickell, the loft 2 downtown, brickell roads, brickell terrace condo, the ivy, mayfield condo, the grand condo, the platinum condo, nine at mary brickell village, the axis on brickell, fifty seven residences, courvoisier courts condo, le parc at brickell, brickell east condo, reach brickell city centre, 1800 club, city 24, gallery art condo, residences at riverwalk, the ivy, brickell biscayne, bayshore place condo, onyx on the bay, bay house, carbonell condo, the plaza at brickell, infinity at brickell, blue condo, monarc at met 3,, one bayfront plaza, wind by neo', '_mr11']
